import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { fetchingData, fetchingUserDetails } from '../redux/ReducerComponents/User/Action' import './Main.css' function Main({ userData, fetchingData, fetchingUserDetails, addData }) { useEffect(async () => { await fetchingData() console.log("UseEffect", addData?.data) }, []) const [showUser, setShowuser] = useState(null) const readData = (id, user) => { // fetchingUserDetails(id) setShowuser(user) } const [visibleList, setVisiblelist] = useState({}); const handleDelete = (id) => { console.log(visibleList[id]) if (visibleList[id] === undefined) { setVisiblelist({ ...visibleList, [id]: true }) } else { console.log("in else") } } return (

) } const mapStateToProps = state => { console.log("mapStateToProps", state.user) return { userData: state?.user, addData: state?.add } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { fetchingData: () => dispatch(fetchingData()), fetchingUserDetails: (id) => dispatch(fetchingUserDetails(id)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Main)
